net.sourceforge.solexatools.authentication
Class OICRLdapAuthentication

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.solexatools.authentication.Authentication
      net.sourceforge.solexatools.authentication.OICRLdapAuthentication

public class OICRLdapAuthentication
extends Authentication

This authentication plugin allows the SeqWare Portal to authenticate against the Ontario Institute for Cancer Research (OICR) LDAP server. Users will pass in an email address and password. An associated list of uids that match the email address will be retrieved via an LDAP directory search. More than one uid will be returned for users who have multiple credentials. This plugin will loop through the uids and attempt to authenticate with the provided password.
